100  509.06us  507.79us  511.72us  [CUDA memcpy DtoD]

body:
relu seems to be doing additional copying
```
100  509.06us  507.79us  511.72us  [CUDA memcpy DtoD]
```
shows up in nvperf output when you have the relu, but not when you have the threshold.
The computation kernels themselves seem to be quite similar:
```
496.11us  494.92us  497.39us  void kernelPointwiseApply2<ThresholdUpdateOutput<float>, float, float, unsigned int, int=1, int=1>(OffsetInfo<ThresholdUpdateOutput<float>, float, unsigned int>, OffsetInfo<float, float, int=1>, float, float)
```
```
495.07us  494.25us  496.14us  void kernelPointwiseApply1<TensorMaxValueOp<float>, float, unsigned int, int=1>(OffsetInfo<TensorMaxValueOp<float>, float, unsigned int>, float, float)
```
